title: GET_TATTOO_SHOP_DLC_ITEM_INDEX
content:
0x10144267DD22866C// GetTattooShopDlcItemIndex
int GET_TATTOO_SHOP_DLC_ITEM_INDEX(int character, int collection, int preset);Parameters:character: AKA eFaction in shop_tattoo.meta. Which character this tattoo belongs to. See GET_NUM_TATTOO_SHOP_DLC_ITEMS.collection: Which collection this tattoo belongs to. If you specify -1, it will check all collections.preset: Which preset this tattoo belongs to.Returns: Returns the actual index (Not ID from shop_tattoo.meta) from 0 to GET_NUM_TATTOO_SHOP_DLC_ITEMS, or -1 (if it failed to find the tattoo) of a tattoo.NativeDB Introduced: v2189
codeBlocks:
// GetTattooShopDlcItemIndex
int GET_TATTOO_SHOP_DLC_ITEM_INDEX(int character, int collection, int preset);
